Rails app for visualising New Zealand Census data
description: Census data is released in one large CSV available from Stats New Zealand on a meshblock-level. The data has been cleaned to remove some inaccuracies. This project's goal is to provide a set of endpoints for plotting data on New Zealand maps.

title: The toolkit to analyse various types of data collected from New Zealand Genomic Observatory project
description: The toolkit is initially designed to analyse various types of data collected from New Zealand Genomic Observatory project, but we are aimed to integrate these tools to create an open-source framework useful and reusable for data analysis and modelling in bioinformatics and ecology.

title: Data relating to New Zealand's Civil Defence Centres

title: A New Zealand Capital Markets Engine from NZSE
description: A New Zealand Capital Markets Engine from NZSE for a Retail Investor, Instituitional Investor, Hedge Fund Managers, and Asset Managers to aggregate real-time data from numerous sources to SQLite Database. title: R package to distribute New Zealand crash data in a convenient form
description: This package redistributes crash statistics already available from the New Zealand Transport Agency, but in a more convenient form. It's a large package (over 20 megabytes, compressed).

title: Data for driver offences in New Zealand - cleaned for reuse.
description: The data for mobile phone offences in 2009 only includes November and December months. This is because the law was introduced in 2009. The data for 2015 is only for the January month.

title: R code for the New Zealand Election Study
description: This is some code for converting the Election survey results file in SPSS to a csv spreadsheet file. As there are values labels, but not values labels for every value, it needs a little massaging beyond the simple commands.

title: Grooming (and other things!) for New Zealand fisheries catch and effort data
description: A system for requesting, loading, grooming and merging New Zealand fisheries catch and effort data. We use groomer at Trophia in analyses of catch and effort data.
